abstract: Prime time television, after years of dramas and reality shows dominating ratings, is swinging back toward comedies; sitcoms occupy seven of 10 top spots among most lucrative category of viewers ages 18 to 49.
snippet: After years of dramas and reality shows, television’s pendulum appears to be swinging toward the laugh track.
lead_paragraph: After years of dramas and reality shows, television’s pendulum appears to be swinging toward the laugh track.

headline.main: In a Gloomy Economy, TV Sitcoms Are Making a Comeback
headline.print_headline: In Today’s Gloomy Economy, TV Sitcoms Are Making a Comeback
headline.seo: In a Gloomy Economy, TV Sitcoms Are Making a Comeback
